content: Thanks for this Article Chad! The point that Medium is not a regular social network got me thinking. A while ago I joined Facebook to stay in contact with old friends and acquaintances, but now it’s all about liking and sharing random stuff. Opposed to Medium, there is very little original content. On using music for focus: I tried focus at will some time ago - https://www.focusatwill.com . I’m not sure if it’s really due to their special frequencies, but it helped to provoke relaxed or energized states in a way.
